channel.title: [DELTA] auto spawn npc's
channel.description: ok so I have a delta source, and some npcs are already spawned. But there is no autospawn.cfg file and I don't know what file i can add them to to make more npcs spawn. can someone please help?

item.title: [DELTA] auto spawn npc's
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“RankTex, post:5, topic:522335”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=640840.msg4317786#msg4317786 date=1371770458]

I bet you are the person who got me Moderated… Haha you will be watched pretty soon, buddy.

No, I was the person. Sk8rdude done this to prove a point (even though he shouldn’t have), you done it to be a pain in the ass. Just because one user does something doesn’t mean you should follow suit.
[/quote]

You know what, Ruby? I don’t see why the Mopar staff have to be stuck up assholes. Ban me from the mopar forums, I honestly do not give a flying love. I have a better community. I want you to know that this site is full of backstabbing idiots and people who try to give viruses. Mopar Forums SUCK!!!

If skater shouldnt have posted that then he should be watched or even moderated, aswell. I bet he won’t because Mopar picks favorites.[/quote]
He posted it once as an example, you done it at least twice(spamming).

Read full topic
